summary: Executive Profile: 21-year internationally-regarded coaching professional with 13-year national certifications in Strength & Conditioning. Industry-leading athletic performance executive with expertise in high-performance training, facility design and operations, staff recruitment and development, budgeting, and strategic partnerships. Experienced in athletic programming for Elite, High-School and General Population athletes, as well as education and public speaking at national/international venues.

experience.title: Director/President
experience.description: Responsible for concept, design, oversight of construction and opening of the Nation's first half-public, half-private Performance Training Athletic Facility; secured strategic partnerships and sponsorships; provided operational oversight including scheduling, programming, zone layout, organizational philosophies and staff recruitment; oversaw budgeting, membership structures and continuing strategic initiatives.

experience.title: Director of Human Performance
experience.description: Coordination of all aspects of Athletic Human Performance for SSCV athletes including Strength and Conditioning, Sport Psychology, Nutrition, periodized programming, testing, data analysis and medical coordination; recruitment, hiring and evaluation of HP staff; collaboration with sport-specific coaching staff; design and execution of an annual 55-hour continuing education program; safety systems oversight for FIS events.

experience.title: Director of Strength and Conditioning
experience.description: Concept, design and execution of SSCV's first dedicated Strength & Conditioning program; facility procurement and design; partnerships for equipment and technology; program designs for all five snow sport disciplines; annual athletic periodization planning; safety systems oversight for FIS events.

experience.title: Head Strength and Conditioning Coach / Assistant Alpine Coach
experience.description: Designed and coached discipline-specific strength and conditioning for elite World Cup and Paralympic athletes; data tracking and progress reporting; coordination with USOC Sport Science programs and Howard Head Sport Medicine; on-hill coaching and program management; sponsorship coordination.

certifications: Registered Strength and Conditioning Coach Certification (RSCC) – 2011
NSCA Level III Mentorship, Sport Performance – 2007
EXOS AP Performance Mentorship Level II – 2006
EXOS AP Performance Mentorship Level I – 2005
